notes: Modern studio apartment with recessed lighting, built-in wardrobes, digital door lock, and updated kitchen with stainless steel fridge and built-in microwave. Very clean condition with contemporary finishes. For baby safety: balcony has glass door access but appears to have proper railings; no stairs visible in main living area; corners on furniture are relatively rounded. Glass shower enclosure and balcony washing machine area would need supervision with a crawling baby.
